title: Project Comparing Cognitive Processes in Virtual and Physical Laboratories

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational engineering knowledge and grasp of basic experimental design principles
context.additional_context: Cultivation of practical engineering problem-solving skills through virtual laboratory projects linked to industrial settings.

learning_goals: Students can explain cognitive processes related to experimental design in virtual/physical laboratory environments with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can derive at least three differences by comparing ambiguity patterns based on laboratory types.
Students demonstrate critical thinking required to solve engineering problems in real industrial settings with over 70% engagement through virtual lab projects.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
